price: It was already said by those before them[13], but all what they earned was of no avail to them,
arabic: قَدۡ قَالَهَا ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡ فَمَآ أَغۡنَىٰ عَنۡهُم مَّا كَانُواْ يَكۡسِبُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
